title_long: Scott Pilgrim Volume 5: Scott Pilgrim vs The Universe (Scott Pilgrim's)
summary: Scott Pilgrim just turned 24, and things couldn't possibly be better! This means things are about to get infinitely worse. Suddenly, TWO of Ramona's evil ex-boyfriends are in town, and they're playing dirty. His band is in turmoil, and his own exes aren't making things any easier. And what's up with Ramona, anyway? She's been acting kinda weird ever since they moved in together. It's the SECOND LAST VOLUME of SCOTT PILGRIM: Scott's precious little life is coming back around to bite him in the butt, and it may not be pretty!
title_latin: Scott Pilgrim Volume 5: Scott Pilgrim vs The Universe
title: Scott Pilgrim Volume 5: Scott Pilgrim vs The Universe
